params._manager: The address of the manager to add
params._poolId: The ID of the pool to add the manager to

addToCloneableStrategies(address).details: 'msg.sender' must be the Allo contract owner.

params._strategy: The address of the strategy to add

allocate(uint256,bytes).details: Each strategy will handle the allocation of funds differently.

params._data: The data to pass to the strategy and may be handled differently by each strategy.
params._poolId: The ID of the pool to allocate funds from

batchAllocate(uint256[],bytes[]).details: Each strategy will handle the allocation of funds differently

params._data: The data to pass to the strategy and may be handled differently by each strategy
params._poolIds: The pool ID's to register the recipients for

createPool(bytes32,address,bytes,address.custom:initstrategydata: The encoded data will be specific to a given strategy requirements,    reference the strategy implementation of 'initialize()'
createPool(bytes32,address,bytes,address.details: 'msg.sender' must be owner or member of the profile id passed as '_profileId'.

params._initStrategyData: The data to initialize the strategy
params._profileId: The ID of the registry profile, used to check if 'msg.sender' is a member or owner of the profile
params._strategy: The address of the strategy contract the pool will use.

createPoolWithCustomStrategy(bytes32,add.details: 'msg.sender' must be a member or owner of a profile to create a pool with or without a custom strategy, The encoded data      will be specific to a given strategy requirements, reference the strategy implementation of 'initialize()'. The strategy      address passed must not be a cloneable strategy. The strategy address passed must not be the zero address. 'msg.sender' must      be a member or owner of the profile id passed as '_profileId'.

params._amount: The amount of the token you want to deposit into the pool on initialization
params._initStrategyData: The data to initialize the strategy
params._managers: The managers of the pool, and can be added/removed later by the pool admin
params._metadata: The 'Metadata' of the pool, this uses our 'Meatdata.sol' struct (consistent throughout the protocol)
params._profileId: The 'profileId' of the registry profile, used to check if 'msg.sender' is a member or owner of the profile
params._strategy: The address of the deployed custom strategy
params._token: The address of the token you want to use in your pool

distribute(uint256,address[],bytes).details: Each strategy will handle the distribution of funds differently

params._data: The data to pass to the strategy and may be handled differently by each strategy
params._poolId: The ID of the pool to distribute from
params._recipientIds: The recipient ids to distribute to

returns._0: percentFee The current percentage for the fee

params._poolId: The ID of the pool to check

returns._0: pool The 'Pool' struct for the ID of the pool passed in

params._poolId: The ID of the pool to check

returns._0: strategy The address of the strategy for the ID of the pool passed in

params._strategy: The address of the strategy to check

params._poolId: The ID of the pool to check

returns._0: 'true' if the '_address' is a pool admin, otherwise 'false'

params._poolId: The ID of the pool to check

returns._0: 'true' if the '_address' is a pool manager, otherwise 'false'

params._recipient: The address to send the recovered funds to

params._poolId: The ID of the pool to register the recipient for

removeFromCloneableStrategies(address).details: 'msg.sender' must be the Allo contract owner.

params._strategy: The address of the strategy to remove

params._manager: The address of the manager to remove
params._poolId: The ID of the pool to remove the manager from

updateBaseFee(uint256).details: 'msg.sender' must be the Allo contract owner.

updatePercentFee(uint256).details: 'msg.sender' must be the Allo contract owner.

params._percentFee: The new percentage for the fee

params._poolId: The ID of the pool to update

updateRegistry(address).details: 'msg.sender' must be the Allo contract owner.

updateTreasury(address).details: 'msg.sender' must be the Allo contract owner.

addPoolManager(uint256,address).notice: Adds a pool manager to the pool.

addToCloneableStrategies(address).notice: Adds a strategy to the cloneable strategies.

createPool(bytes32,address,bytes,address.notice: Creates a new pool (by cloning a cloneable strategies).

createPoolWithCustomStrategy(bytes32,add.notice: Creates a new pool (with a custom strategy)

distribute(uint256,address[],bytes).notice: Distributes funds to recipients and emits {Distributed} event if successful

getPool(uint256).notice: Returns the 'Pool' struct for a given 'poolId'

getStrategy(uint256).notice: Returns the address of the strategy for a given 'poolId'

isCloneableStrategy(address).notice: Checks if a strategy is cloneable (is in the cloneableStrategies mapping).

isPoolAdmin(uint256,address).notice: Checks if an address is a pool admin.

isPoolManager(uint256,address).notice: Checks if an address is a pool manager.

registerRecipient(uint256,bytes).notice: Registers a recipient and emits {Registered} event if successful and may be handled differently by each strategy.

removeFromCloneableStrategies(address).notice: Removes a strategy from the cloneable strategies.

removePoolManager(uint256,address).notice: Removes a pool manager from the pool.

updatePercentFee(uint256).notice: Updates the percentage for the fee.
